mapper.select: select o.order_no, i.item_img, i.item_name, o.order_count, o.order_price from tb_order o, tb_item i where o.item_no = i.item_no and o.order_state = 1 and o.user_no = #{user_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_order(order_no, user_no, item_no, order_count, order_state, order_price, order_date) values (tb_order_seq.nextval, #{user_no}, #{item_no}, #{order_count}, 1, #{order_price}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from tb_item where item_name like '%'||#{item_name}||'%'
